io.digitalbits.sdk

Class Transaction

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.digitalbits.sdk.Transaction

  • public class Transaction
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents Transaction in DigitalBits network.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Transaction.Builder
      Builds a new Transaction object.

    • Method Detail

      • sign

        public void sign(KeyPair signer)
        Adds a new signature ed25519PublicKey to this transaction.
        Parameters:
        signer - KeyPair object representing a signer

      • sign

        public void sign(byte[] preimage)
        Adds a new sha256Hash signature to this transaction by revealing preimage.
        Parameters:
        preimage - the sha256 hash of preimage should be equal to signer hash

      • hash

        public byte[] hash()
        Returns transaction hash.

      • signatureBase

        public byte[] signatureBase()
        Returns signature base.

      • getTimeBounds

        public TimeBounds getTimeBounds()
        Returns:
        TimeBounds, or null (representing no time restrictions)

      • getFee

        public int getFee()
        Returns fee paid for transaction in stroops (1 stroop = 0.0000001 XLM).

      • toXdr

        public io.digitalbits.sdk.xdr.Transaction toXdr()
        Generates Transaction XDR object.

      • toEnvelopeXdr

        public io.digitalbits.sdk.xdr.TransactionEnvelope toEnvelopeXdr()
        Generates TransactionEnvelope XDR object. Transaction need to have at least one signature.

      • toEnvelopeXdrBase64

        public java.lang.String toEnvelopeXdrBase64()
        Returns base64-encoded TransactionEnvelope XDR object. Transaction need to have at least one signature.
